scripts.check-clean:
if [[ $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then echo '*** Please stash or commit changes first ***
' && exit 1; fi
scripts.pre-push: yarn test && yarn lint && yarn check-clean
scripts.shipit: yarn pre-push && git push --tags origin head
scripts.test: hc clone --force . teh-test && hc test teh-test
scripts.testv: hc --debug --verbose clone --force . teh-test && hc --debug --verbose test teh-test
